Do you have to plan your own photo session or a trip? You can change your GPS location and date within the app so you know exactly when the best time is for your photos.

The Golden hour, also known as magic hour corresponds to a special and sought after condition of natural sunlight with a high diffusion, warm temperature, low incidence and limited energy. In photography the golden hour translates into soft light, warm colors, shadows so long that they tend to disappear and a good level of contrast despite the reduced dynamics. Its opposite is the Blue hour that identifies a specific condition of the solar light characterized by a colder temperature and a low energy, which, in practical terms, results in subjects with numerous penumbra, de-saturated and colder colors and intense blue sky. The golden hour occurs when the sun is very low on the horizon and therefore in the moments after sunrise and before sunset, the blue hour instead at sunset or sunrise, in twilight situation, when the sun it's below the horizon. The time, duration and intensity of these "magical hours" change according to the seasons, latitudes and weather conditions and therefore this app will help you to identify them perfectly.

The app combines highly accurate weather forecast for your location with a 3D map showing development of weather in a broader area in a very interesting way. This allows you to see where precipitation is going to come from or where the wind is blowing from. The uniqueness of the app comes from the amount of data displayed. Forecast of weather, precipitation, wind, cloud cover, atmospheric pressure, snow cover and other meteorological data for different altitudes is available for the whole world. 

WIND ANIMATION
The Ventusky application solves weather displaying in an interesting way. Wind is displayed using streamlines which clearly portray the continuous development of weather. Airflow on Earth is always in motion and the streamlines depict this motion in an amazing way. This makes the interconnection of all atmospheric phenomena obvious.

WEATHER FORECAST
Weather forecast for the first three days is available in the app in one-hour steps. For other days, it’s available in three-hour steps. Users can also look up sunrise and sunrise times in a given place or air quality.

WEATHER MODELS
Thanks to the Ventusky application, visitors get data directly from the numerical models that, just a few years ago, were used solely by meteorologists. The app collects data from the most accurate numerical models. Besides the well-known data from the American GFS and HRRR models, it also displays data from the Canadian GEM model and the German ICON model, which is unique thanks to its high resolution for the whole world. Two models, EURAD and USRAD, are based on current radar and satellite readings. These models are able to show precisely current precipitation in US and Europe.

WEATHER FRONTS
You can also display weather fronts. We have created a neural network that predicts the positions of cold, warm, occluded, and stationary fronts based on data from weather models. This algorithm is unique, and we are the first on the world who makes global fronts forecast available to users.

Our love and gratitude.

케이웨더 날씨(날씨, 미세먼지, 기상청, 위젯, 대기오염)

《《《 동별로 확인하는 정확한 날씨와 미세먼지 정보 》》》

국내 최대 날씨와 공기 정보서비스 제공 기업 케이웨더의 날씨 어플리케이션 “케이웨더 날씨”가 동별로 정확한 날씨와 미세먼지 정보를 실시간으로 알려드립니다. 

“케이웨더 날씨”는 동별 날씨와 미세먼지의 실시간 정보 제공을 위해 구별로 제공되는 국가관측망 정보에 2,000여개의 민간관측망 데이터를 지역별 오염배출정보, 인구밀도, 지형 및 토지피복 등 빅데이터를 인공지능으로 조합하여 실시간으로 보정된 자료를 제공합니다.

이제부터 동별로 다른 날씨와 미세먼지 정보를 실시간으로 확인하세요!!!

[우리동네 날씨 정보]
■ 더욱 상세한 날씨정보(개황, 일출/일몰시간, 일별/시간별 바람, 강수 정보 등) 제공
■ 해외 주요 도시 날씨 정보 제공
■ 날씨 방송, 날씨 속보, 기상관련 뉴스 정보 제공
■ 기상특보, 황사정보, 태풍정보 제공

[우리동네 미세먼지 정보]
■ 국가측정망과 민간측정망 데이터를 융합하여 생산하는 ‘내가 숨 쉬는 공기’ 
■ 동 별로 제각기 다른 미세먼지 실황 정보
■ 10분 단위로 업데이트 되는 실시간 미세먼지 정보
■ 전문 예보관의 미세먼지 예보 (5일, 3시간 단위)

[편의기능]
■ 케이웨더/기상청 예보 비교 선택 가능(환경설정에서 선택)
■ 지역 동별(동, 읍) 선택 및 추가/삭제 가능

[위젯]
■ 시간별 위젯
■ 나절별 위젯
■ 일별 위젯
■ 미세먼지 위젯

[접근 권한 안내]
■ 위치정보   - 케이웨더 날씨 앱 내에서 현 위치 검색에 사용됩니다. 서버에 별도로 저장하지는 않으며 현 위치 검색을 할 때에만 확인 합니다.

* 선택 접근 권한은 동의하지 않아도 해당 기능 외의 서비스를 이용할 수 있습니다.
* 선택 접근 권한 미동의시 서비스 일부 기능의 정상적인 이용이 어려울 수 있습니다.


[자주 묻는 질문]
■ 현재 밖에 비오는데 현재 날씨는 맑음으로 되어있어요.  
- 현재 날씨는 기상청 관측소 값을 토대로 표출하는 것으로 1시간마다 갱신됩니다. 따라서 갱신주기에 따라 늦게 반영될 수 있습니다.
■ 예보가 맞지 않아요.   - 예보는 예상하는 확률로써 100% 확실하지 않으며, 이상기후로 인한 기상이변이 심해짐에 따라 적중률 높은 예보를 내는 것이 더욱 어려워지고 있습니다. 기상변화가 심할 경우 케이웨더, 기상청 예보를 번갈아 보시면서 날씨 변화에 대비하시기 바랍니다.
■ 정보가 업데이트되지 않아요.
- 트래픽이 몰리는 출근시간 및 매시 정각에는 업데이트가 간헐적으로 지연될 수 있습니다. 이럴 경우 새로고침 버튼을 눌러 보시거나 1~2분뒤에 앱 재실행 부탁 드립니다.
■ 위젯이 현위치를 잡지 않아요.(-> 추후 업데이트를 통하여 자동으로 현위치를 잡을 수 있도록 변경예정입니다.)
- 오른쪽 상단의 새로고침 버튼을 눌러주세요.
■ 업데이트 후 홈 위젯이 보이지 않아요.
- 아이폰을 재시작 해주세요.

The Wind & Weather Meter app works with the WeatherFlow WINDmeter and the WeatherFlow WEATHERmeter -- available for purchase at retailers online and offline. 

When paired with a WeatherFlow meter, this free app allows you to take & share weather reports from your exact location. Capture highly accurate weather data, including wind speed (average, gust and lull), wind direction, air temperature, humidity and pressure. The app also give you values such as wind chill, heat index, apparent wind, crosswind, tailwind, dew point, air density and more. Add a description and instantly share your report via Twitter, Facebook, SMS, email and more. Weather reports captured from this app can be posted instantly to popular online weather services including iKitesurf, iWindsurf, SailFlow, WindAlert, and FishWeather.

Weather Widget is an easy-to-use widget app for you to fully customize widgets background to fit your phone's stylish home screen.

Each weather widget on your home screen can show weather conditions and forecasts for a different location. Enjoy full of weather+ info of your current place and many friends, family members, or your next destination on your home screen.


Weather Widget features main:

- Current weather and conditions of your location or any locations you want you to check
- Current condition info including temperature, real feel temperature, humidity, wind info, sunrise, sunset, UV index, rain info, and cloud cover.
- Add many locations to quickly check whether data of them
- Multiple different locations show in different widgets on the home screen
- Select from many Weather icon sets
- Hourly forecast up to the next 72 hours
- Daily forecast up to the next 15 days
- Many premium background colors and images.
- Upload your own photos or images to make a unique widget background.


WORKS ON ALL DEVICES

Weather Widget works on all iOS/iPadOS devices with the only requirement being that it is running iOS 14+.
